What is an IO game?

IO  game is  a  special kind of  online game. First of  all  ‚Äî IO  game is  a  game which requires nothing to  play but modern web browser and Internet connection. Second  ‚Äî IO  game is  free-to-play, massively multiplayer online game. Somebody in  the Internet once described  IO game as  ‚ÄúA  game that easy to  understand yet hard to  master‚Äù. This is  general yet very good description of  the cool  IO game. You can play it  5  minutes or  you can play it  5  hours  ‚Äî in  both cases you‚Äôll get a  lot of  fun. That‚Äôs what make  IO games really awesome!

There are different types of  IO games. In  fact you can find a  game of  any genre among all of  IO games. It‚Äôs not just simple action games like famous Agar.io or  Slither.io . There are platformers , 2D  shooters or  racing . You can find even RPG IO  games or  real-time strategies . Today almost all popular game types can be  found among  IO games!
